Title: VRE for Cancer Imaging Sharepoint Solution
Description: The Virtual Research Environment for Cancer Imaging Sandbox Solutions makes it easier for users to see and annotate medical images within Sharepoint. It's developed in C# and Silverlight. It runs in the SharePoint Sandbox, and therefore can be installed by any user.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Virtual Research Environment for Cancer Imaging Sandbox Solutions makes it easier for users to see and annotate medical images within Sharepoint. It's developed in C# and Silverlight. It runs in the SharePoint Sandbox, and therefore can be installed by any user.

This work was part of the "Virtual Research Environment Framework for Cancer Imaging" (VRE-CI) project, part of phase three of the VRE programme funded by the Joint Information Systems Committee (JISC) to provide a framework to allow researchers and clinicians involved in Cancer Imaging to share information, images and algorithms.

  • Installing the VRECI SharePoint Sandbox Solution
  • Adding, viewing and annotating a DICOM image
  • File Structures and Schemas
